code: import React from'react';var Amount=function Amount(props){var amount=props.amount;console.log(amount);var totalAmount=amount.reduce(function(totalAmount,product){return totalAmount+product.price;},0);var internetCharge=0;if(totalAmount>1000){internetCharge=100;}else if(totalAmount>500){internetCharge=50;}else if(totalAmount>200){internetCharge=10;}var grandTotal=internetCharge+totalAmount;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h4",null,"Order Summery"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h3",null,"Items Ordered: ",amount.length),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,"Product Price : $",totalAmount),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("small",null,"Internet Charge: $",internetCharge.toFixed(0)),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h3",null,"Total Amount : ",grandTotal));};export default Amount;
